title: Duo partner (Plat season 6+)

embed.description: Target Me Please / Gold 5 84LP / 25W 22L Win Ratio 53% / Twitch - 15W 9L Win Ratio 63%, Ezreal - 3W 3L Win Ratio 50%, Poppy - 1W 1L Win Ratio 50%, Rek'Sai - 1W 1L Win Ratio 50%, Lee Sin - 0W 2L Win Ratio 0%

body:
So far I haven't really had the 'need' for a duo partner, but I can't deny the amount of losses I have that could of been wins if I had just one person with me to take some of that weight off my shoulders each game. Only duo'd one game out of all of my matches this season so far so it is safe to say I could do with a partner who is on regularly and fairly consistent in their play. Role is not too much of a concern. I play ADC so as long as you don't want that then we'll be cool. Sick of going 7/0 then finishing the game 10/5 or something because I got some 10/0 irelia shoving her blades up my butt. 

I peaked P4 last season but I finished P5. This season I got placed in S1 and currently I am G5, within the next two hours from this being posted I should hopefully be G4. I would prefer someone who was plat+ In season 6 who really wants to climb. Hit me up in game ya want I'm on ALOT.

Always keen to improve as I really do want to climb, so like minded people are always welcome to tag along.

- Target Me Please

replies.body: We have a close mmr, added you on league.
